director.name: Ana Flavia Cavalcanti Ana Flavia Cavalcanti
胡利娅·扎基亚 Julia Zakia

introduction: The rain is dripping through the ceiling and there is not much space to sleep. With calm resolve, a young mother braves the challenges of everyday life with her two children. She is skeptical when in the middle of the night there is a knock on the door and a friend wants to store something unusual in her yard. The next day they end up having an unexpected feast. A nuanced look at poverty, brief moments of happiness and community togetherness.
